snippet.title: Oilers coach Eakins defined by total commitment
snippet.description: and finishing in Leadville, Colo., Eakins began a journey that would test his body, his mind and his resolve. He finished in just over 11 hours, holding his daughter Emerson's hand as she ran beside his bike for the final few feet to the finish line.
